long_description: XC97xxSeries is asynchronous Step-DownDC/DC converter. The Step-Downconverter block incorporates 36mΩhi-side driver transistor and a synchronous 10mΩlow-side switching transistor. By minimizing ON resistance of the built-in transistors, XC97xx series can deliver highly efficient and stable output current up to 5A. With high switching frequenciesof 1MHz,a choice of a small inductor is possible. The output voltage can be adjustable by external resistors. The control method (Fixed PWM or PFM/PWM automatic switch-over) can be selectable by MODEpin.
features: Protection Circuit:Thermal ShutdownShort Circuit Protection or HICCUP
Functions:UVLO, Power Good,CLHigh Speed DischargeExt. Synchronization
Environmentally Friendly:EU RoHS Compliant, Pb Free
